title: pes rr ai over bmsce cse
content:
i chose PES RR AIML over BMSCE CSE
W OR L?
please sgare ur opinions everyone

comments.body: U can choose whatever you like

Bmsce cse seems like a better choice
Atleast for me
Core would have been better maybe youâ€™ll get it later

That's not true. First off bms crowd is same as pes now pretty much. Your second point is sorta valid but pcm dosent dictate quality of peer grp to a great extent. Pes rr aiml covers all core cs courses so it's very very slightly worse than core cs. Ec cs is objectively the same with centralised placements and curriculum.
Better because lesser crowd,core cs,kcet and comedk is more competitive than pessat so better peer group also,easier curriculum. But according to me pes rr cse>bms cs>pes rr ai=pes ec cse
See faqs as to why seniors have told that aiml is bad
Bruh they updated aiml syllabus to include all cs core topics. It's not nearly as bad as it was.
Basing ur decisions on cutoffs is straight up stupid
